name: PVPScores
tagline: A Minecraft plugin for managing PVP Kill Scores. Written in JavaScript using ScriptCraft.
body:
A plugin that give you an easy way to manage PVP matches and scoreboards. ## Dependencies ScriptCraft
This plugin (like ScriptCraft) works with any Bukkit/Spigot server. ## Installation Install ScriptCraft, download the latest PVPScoresPlugin release from here, and extract the zip folder to your ScriptCraft plugin directory. ## Usage All of the commands are ops-only (for good reason!) Here is a (sort of) up-to-date list of commands:
startMatch()
endMatch()
resetScores()
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
